description: This file defines the SearchActivity class which hosts a fragment for search functionality within an Android app. It manages the lifecycle, creates and sets a fragment container view, and provides a method to create intents to launch this activity.

classes.name: SearchActivity
classes.description: An activity that hosts the SearchFragment to handle search functionalities within the Android app.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up the fragment container, and loads the SearchFragment if no saved state exists.

methods.name: createIntent
methods.description: Creates an intent to launch SearchActivity.
